title: BRIEF-ESSA Pharma Files Prospectus Related To Offering Of 20.5 Mln Common Shares
text:
BRIEF-ESSA Pharma Files Prospectus Related To Offering Of 20.5 Mln Common Shares

Stock Markets 36 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 06:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-ESSA Pharma Files Prospectus Related To Offering Of 20.5 Mln Common Shares Oct 9 (Reuters) - ESSA Pharma Inc : * ESSA PHARMA FILES PROSPECTUS RELATED TO OFFERING OF 20.5 MILLION COMMON SHARES OF CO THAT MAY BE OFFERED FOR RESALE BY SELLING SHAREHOLDERS - SEC FILING Source: Further company coverage: EPI.V
